Class Customer

com.example.tpairviafx.Customer
public class Customer extends Object
Class to model customers
Author:
Bendeguz Kudor

    Creates a new Customer object with the given first name, last name, email, phone, fixed discount, discount for purchases below $1000, discount for purchases between $1000 and $2000, and discount for purchases above $2000.

  • Constructor Details

    • Customer

      public Customer(String firstName, String lastName, String email, String phone, double fixeddiscount, double below1000, double between1and2000, double morethan2000)
      Creates a new Customer object with the given first name, last name, email, phone, fixed discount, discount for purchases below $1000, discount for purchases between $1000 and $2000, and discount for purchases above $2000.
      Parameters:
      firstName - the first name of the customer
      lastName - the last name of the customer
      email - the email address of the customer
      phone - the phone number of the customer
      fixeddiscount - the fixed discount percentage for the customer
      below1000 - the discount percentage for purchases below $1000 for the customer
      between1and2000 - the discount percentage for purchases between $1000 and $2000 for the customer
      morethan2000 - the discount percentage for purchases above $2000 for the customer

    • Customer

      public Customer(String firstName, String lastName, int customerID)
      Constructor used for modeling the customer in a TableView
      Parameters:
      firstName - the first name of the customer
      lastName - the last name of the customer
      customerID - id of the customer

    • Customer

      public Customer(String firstName, String lastName, int customerID, double fixeddiscount, double below1000, double between1and2000, double morethan2000)
      Constructor used when modelling the customer discount editing interface
      Parameters:
      firstName - the first name of the customer
      lastName - the last name of the customer
      customerID - the unique identifier for the customer
      fixeddiscount - the fixed discount amount for the customer
      below1000 - the discount percentage for purchases below $1000 for the customer
      between1and2000 - the discount percentage for purchases between $1000 and $2000 for the customer
      morethan2000 - the discount percentage for purchases over $2000 for the customer

      public static void recordCustomer(Customer customer)
